name: unspoiled
content:

C1 An unspoiled place is beautiful because it has not been changed or damaged by people: an island with clean, unspoiled beaches There are miles of unspoilt coastline and moors to explore.
Something that is unspoiled by another thing has not been badly affected by it: These were the good old days, still unspoiled by materialism and television.
An unspoiled person does not behave as if they can do or have whatever they want without paying attention to other people's feelings, but thinks about others and shows them respect: The parents from North Jersey wanted help on how to raise unspoiled children in the affluent world they inhabit. The children are delightful and unspoilt. After years of fame, she remains unaffected, unspoilt, modest, and generous. Opposite
